titles.title: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2006
A bill to require the Federal Government to purchase fuel efficient automobiles, and for other purposes.
Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2006 - Amends provisions relating to standards for executive agency automobiles to require each passenger vehicle purchased, or leased for at least 60 consecutive days, by an executive agency after enactment of this Act to be as fuel efficient as possible.
